description:
Your personal research assistant

Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, annotate, cite, and share research.
- Clarify confirmation prompt when using Replace Online Library
- [Mac] Fixed broken Select Items dialog when using Zotero Connector for Safari (since 7.0.24)
- Fixed item sometimes not being added to collection on cross-library drag-and-drop
- Fixed broken citation dialog if item for an unloaded tab was deleted
- Fixed note type picker appearing in Google Docs
- Fixed Chinese full stop being rendered as period (since 7.0.23)
- Fixed deleted tags reappearing when quickly deleting tags
- Improved handling of remote filename changes during sync
- Avoid unnecessary style initialization at startup when not using Bibliography Entry item pane header mode
- Don't perform find-as-you-type when pressing 0 in items list
- Fixed “Finish” appearing instead of “Next” in conflict-resolution dialog
- Enabled support for Unicode regex features in file renaming by default
- Fixed broken style selection dialogs after using custom style with invalid locale
- Fixed 500 error from local API when exporting single item
